channel.title: Shufukai on Meishin Muso Ryu
channel.description: Recent content in Shufukai on Meishin Muso Ryu

item.title: 2019 Goyokai Kendo Tournament Results
item.description: Matsushita Shuji sensei won first place in the men’s senior division at this year’s Goyokai Kendo Tournament in Boston. Choi Eunju won third place in the women’s senior division. Congratulations!

item.title: 2019 Boston Kendo Shinsa
item.description: Four Shudokan members took the kendo shinsa in Boston on July 28, 2019. All passed. Congratulations!

item.title: 2018 Goyokai Kendo Tournament
item.description: Two members of Shudokan Dojo won bronze medals at this year’s Goyokai Kendo Tournament in Boston.
